meanings.definition: A flat-topped or rounded flower cluster in which the individual flower stalks arise from about the same point.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with colorful umbels swaying gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: Bees buzzed happily around the umbel, collecting nectar from each tiny flower.
meanings.sent3: The umbrella thought it was cool to imitate an umbel by gathering its spokes at the top.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter spread through the room like an umbel, connecting everyone with joy.
meanings.sent5: The teacher pointed to the umbel in the diagram, making it the focal point of the lesson.

meanings.definition: A type of inflorescence in which the flowers are borne on short stalks of nearly equal length at the same point.
meanings.sent1: The farmer admired the symmetry of the umbel as he harvested the ripe flowers.
meanings.sent2: Each tiny blossom in the umbel added to the beauty of the overall flower cluster.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer created a dress inspired by the shape of an umbel, with flowers blooming at the waist.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline looked like an umbel of buildings, each rising to the same height.
meanings.sent5: The chef garnished the dish with a delicate umbel, enhancing both the flavor and presentation.
